ygData.subject: Re: Need a bind in Freeport
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Do what I do. /petition every time I get hosed. Oh look. Failed collision detection. Here comes a kodiak through the back wall, and it s failing to trigger
ygData.messageBody:
Christine wrote:
>
> I asked the GM if they were going to fix the thing were you log back in from
> the water, and he was like, 'No, I think that's the way it should be - it is
> a dangerous trip!' Well, I totally disagree. To me, if losing link is like
> 'passing out' in the virtual world. If you pass out while fighting a
> monster, you'll die. If you pass out while standing in a field, you'll be
> standing in a field. If you pass out on a boat - you should still be on the
> boat when you wake up!! The idea that you'd end up in the water is
> ridiculous.

Do what I do. /petition every time I get hosed. Oh look. Failed
collision detection.
Here comes a kodiak through the back wall, and it's failing to trigger
the NPC as he claws me through it.

And speaking of boat stories, here's mine:

Have you ever gotten stuck between the sides of the boat and the
Freeport dock?
more than once?
four times?
in a row?
but managed to do the jump right in front of Fentil the GM after
/petitioning several times?
but also managed to get some really cool screen shots of you floating
in the air?

Have you ever explored the boat?
And managed to walk through the walls of the bar into the ocean?
And raise your swimming skill 30 points until the next boat came
back?
And than swam back through the front of the boat into the bar?
Only to have the game crash on you and kick you back into the ocean?
And then do it again when you catch the boat again this way?
And remember to /petition this time as well?

Have you ever seen the message, 'You may only have one /petition in the
queue at a time'?
Multiple times?
you have GM WHO as a hotkey so you know when to submit your
/petitions?


Dirque.
I hate boats.
